subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ike Davis was back at Citi Field for the first time since he was traded, and was 0 for 2 in a win over the Mets, who fired hitting coach Dave Hudgens and cut reliever Jose Valverde.
snippet: Ike Davis was back at Citi Field for the first time since he was traded, and was 0 for 2 in a win over the Mets, who fired hitting coach Dave Hudgens and cut reliever Jose Valverde.
